item.title: Do you know Java: Records
item.description: Java 15 introduces record type. Records are a new kind of class in the Java language. The purpose of a record is to declare that a small group of variables is to be regarded as a new kind of entity. As said in JEP 384. Simple data carrier classes contain too much boilerplate code compared to the data itself. Fields, getter, setters, ctors, toString, equals, hashCode. On the other hand, quite difficult to figure out what the class represents.
